ActiveDirectoryComputerAttribute.description: An LDAP attribute of an Active Directory computer account, in the form of a name:value pair.

ActiveDirectoryConfiguration.description: The configuration for a Microsoft Active Directory (Microsoft AD) studio resource.

properties.name: ComputerAttributes
properties.description: A collection of custom attributes for an Active Directory computer.

type.description: A collection of custom attributes for an Active Directory computer.

properties.name: DirectoryId
properties.description: The directory ID of the Directory Service for Microsoft Active Directory to access using this studio component.

type.description: The directory ID of the Directory Service for Microsoft Active Directory to access using this studio component.

properties.name: OrganizationalUnitDistinguishedName
properties.description: The distinguished name (DN) and organizational unit (OU) of an Active Directory computer.

type.description: The distinguished name (DN) and organizational unit (OU) of an Active Directory computer.

ComputeFarmConfiguration.description: The configuration for a render farm that is associated with a studio resource.

properties.name: ActiveDirectoryUser
properties.description: The name of an Active Directory user that is used on ComputeFarm worker instances.

type.description: The name of an Active Directory user that is used on ComputeFarm worker instances.

properties.name: Endpoint
properties.description: The endpoint of the ComputeFarm that is accessed by the studio component resource.

type.description: The endpoint of the ComputeFarm that is accessed by the studio component resource.

properties.description: The endpoint of the license service that is accessed by the studio component resource.

properties.description: The endpoint of the shared file system that is accessed by the studio component resource.

type.description: The endpoint of the shared file system that is accessed by the studio component resource.

properties.name: FileSystemId
properties.description: The unique identifier for a file system.

properties.name: LinuxMountPoint
properties.description: The mount location for a shared file system on a Linux virtual workstation.

properties.name: ShareName
properties.description: The name of the file share.

type.description: The name of the file share.

properties.name: WindowsMountDrive

type.description: The mount location for a shared file system on a Windows virtual workstation.
